name: Overthrow (MegaManBK7)
description:
Either go through a campaign following an army trying to rise up against a tyrannical ruler,  or just chill with a randomly generated board.  Use your wits to outsmart and outmaneuver the enemy, as you often won't have as much power as the enemy.

This game was made a class project for Game Design at Georgia Tech, from the Overthrow team.
